abstract: BHP Billiton advisers Citigroup and Merrill Lynch have polled Rio Tinto investors on whether they would support “an alternative” to the mining group’s proposed $19.5 billion deal to raise cash from Chinalco, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton advisers Citigroup and Merrill Lynch have polled Rio Tinto investors on whether they would support “an alternative” to the mining group’s proposed $19.5 billion deal to raise cash from Chinalco, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Rio Investors Invite BHP to Propose Alternative, Report Says
